a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Annual area burnt by wildfires by region, 2002 to 2022

Total area of all land types burnt by
wildfires
in hectares.
Data source: Global Wildfire Information System (2022)
Note: Note that for these historical estimates, we rely on data based on the NASA MCD64 MODIS sensor, which, according to the data
provider, might underestimate burnt areas and fire occurrences.
